scripts.dev: cross-env VITE_PLATFORM_TITLE="for Local® Dev™ Mode" vite
scripts.build:all: cross-env npm run prebuild && npm run build:arc && npm run build:ultra && npm run build:ultra2
scripts.build:arc: cross-env-shell PLATFORM="arc" VITE_PLATFORM_TITLE="for Intel® Arc™" "vue-tsc && vite build && node ./build/scripts/render-template.js && electron-builder --config build/build-config.json --win --x64"
scripts.build:ultra: cross-env-shell PLATFORM="ultra" VITE_PLATFORM_TITLE="for Intel® Core™ Ultra" "vue-tsc && vite build && node ./build/scripts/render-template.js && electron-builder --config build/build-config.json --win --x64"
scripts.build:ultra2: cross-env-shell PLATFORM="ultra2" VITE_PLATFORM_TITLE="for Intel® Core™ Ultra Series 2" "vue-tsc && vite build && node ./build/scripts/render-template.js && electron-builder --config build/build-config.json --win --x64"
scripts.build:ultra2-offline: cross-env-shell PLATFORM="ultra2" VITE_PLATFORM_TITLE="for Intel® Core™ Ultra Series 2" "npm run pack-offline ultra2 && npm run prebuild && vue-tsc && vite build && electron-builder --config build/build-config-offline.json --win --x64"
